description: We begin with our helpless little slut standing with one leg up and her hands above her head. She grins when she see The Pope enter. She welcomes the pain, or so she says. She has learned to sexualize the pain, but has no idea what amount of suffering she is about to endure. She is tormented in several ways throughout the day, but the one that takes this little slut over the edge is when her pussy betrays her. Her body convulses and and shutters, but nothing will stop the onslaught of orgasms.
title: Pussy Betrayal - Kasey Warner
